set.text:
This is a set product.
You can also buy the products individually.

companyAndTeamLicense: A single license for just one team/company project or series title (including both commercial and non-commercial purposes).
companyAndTeamUsingCondition:
The title of your project/work (where the purchased product will be used) must be registered with your order. When using the purchased product, the registered title must be identically shown on your project/work.
We recommend that you choose this division if:

- There are two or more team members who will be directly using the product
- It is a team/company project/work for which no personal pen name is specified (ex. Outsourcing, commissions)
copiedLink: A URL link to this page has been copied.

copyright.description1: The brand(artist) holds all copyrights for this product.
copyright.description2: ACON sells license to use this product, not the copyright.
copyright.description3: Buyers may use the purchased products in creations(works){{asterisk}} for commercial/non-commercial purpose

copyrightDescription: We have checked with the creator regarding the product's copyright policies,
thus purchasers may use the product with no concerns.
Please make sure to carefully read the details before making a purchase.
copyrightNoticeDescription:
It is not permissible for the user to transfer, distribute or sell this product including any component or modified component of this product.

Such acts of copyright infringement in any way will result in legal penalties for the infringer.

Individual purchasers can use the product for his/her own projects and are not permitted to use the product for projects in which his/her pen name is not specified (ex. Outsourcing, commisions)
fileInfoDescription: Check the renewed asset by re-downloading the file from the order history on My Page.
fileInfoDescription2: Products sold on ACON3D are intangible works and thus cannot be refunded after purchase or download.
Please make sure to check the file information for this product before making a purchase.
goToAblerVersionFile: Go to the ABLER version of this file
goToSkpVersionFile: Go to the skp version of this file
individualLicense: A non-exclusive, perpetual license to use the product. The purchaser may use the product for an unlimited number of projects (including both commercial and non-commercial purposes).
individualUsingCondition: The purchaser’s registered pen name (submitted with your purchase) must be stated for all secondary works created using the purchased product.

product.goToOtherExtension: Go to the {{ extension }} version of this file

productCopyrightDescription:
The creator retains all of the copyrights associated with this product.

ACON3D sells licenses (not copyrights) to use a product for commercial/non-commercial use, and this is for all products uploaded on ACON3D.

The license can be purchased as an [Individual] license or a [Team/Company] license.

Please choose the appropriate type of division when purchasing a product.
productLicenseDescription: There are three types of usage licenses - [Personal], [Sharing] and [Enterprise]. Please select the appropriate license when purchasing.
qnaDescription: Please ask Conie-bot if you have any urgent inquiries!
areYouSatisfied: Are you satisfied with the product?
pointOnReview: Text review {{normal}}P / Photo review {{photoreview}}P / Best review {{bestreview}}P
reviewContentPlaceholder: Please share your opinion on the product and tips to use the product well! (more than 20 letters)
noteOnReviewContents:
• Your review you can be used for ACON3D's service operation/marketing purposes.
  • Please use [User home - Q&A] board for product inquiry/refund.
  • Reviews that violate ACON3D's review policy may be deleted and point will be retrieved without prior notice.
    • Reviews containing contents that violate related laws such as the Information and Communication Network Act and the Copyright Act (ACON3D Terms and Conditions Article 15)
    • Registration of repeated text that goes against the purpose of product review, registration of content/image unrelated to the product, etc.
areYouSureToDelete: Your review awarded point will be deducted if you delete your review. Do you want to delete your review?
reviewDescription: Write a review of more than 20 characters for paid products
and get 0.30 points to use right away!

specifications.title: Minimum System Requirements, Required Software
specifications.description:
An operating system and software capable of reading each extension are required.


Minimum Specifications

  • OS : Windows 10 64-bit
  • CPU : Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory : 8GB RAM
  • Graphic Card(GPU) : DirectX 11 Compatible, 4GB of VRAM Above

specifications.title: Minimum System Requirements, Required Software
specifications.description:
An operating system is required.


Minimum Specifications

  • OS : Windows 10 64-bit / macOS 12 (Monterey)
  • CPU : Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3, 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory : 2GB RAM
  • Graphic Card(GPU) : Integrated graphics card with OpenGL 2.1 and DirectX 12 support, 1 GB of VRAM Above
